TopicTitle: "FOR MODS" can you mods deactivate this account please?

Articles.Content: Hello Mods. I hope your having a nice day but I'm wondering if you guys and gals can deactivate my account please so I can start a new one. There is nothing wrong with this account and it's just because this account is rather old. Since you can not change usernames more than twice sort of leaves my username looking rather goofy. If the mods of these forums can contact me by mail and or here would be appreciated. Thanks for the help if any.
Not a mod, but account deletion was discussed here:
We moderators do not have the access required to delete accounts. You would need to go through Private Division's account deletion process.
